div.div: Size of this PNG preview of this SVG file: 559 × 363 pixels. Other resolutions: 320 × 208 pixels | 640 × 416 pixels | 800 × 519 pixels | 1,024 × 665 pixels | 1,280 × 831 pixels.

div.p: Original file ‎(SVG file, nominally 559 × 363 pixels, file size: 231 KB)

tr.td:
This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

td.div: English: Gartner Research's Hype Cycle diagram

tr.td: Own work. The underlying concept was conceived by Gartner, Inc [1].

div.style: clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#eee; border:2px solid #ddd; padding:8px; direction: ltr;

div.div: Jeremykemp at English Wikipedia, the copyright holder of this work, hereby publishes it under the following licenses:

dl.dd:
You are free:
to share – to copy, distribute and transmit the work
to remix – to adapt the work

Under the following conditions:
attribution – You must give appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made. You may do so in any reasonable manner, but not in any way that suggests the licensor endorses you or your use.
share alike – If you remix, transform, or build upon the material, you must distribute your contributions under the same or compatible license as the original.

div.i: You may select the license of your choice.

div.div: The original description page was here. All following user names refer to en.wikipedia.

ul.li: 2007-12-28 01:20 Jeremykemp 559×363× (236592 bytes) {{Information |Description=Gartner Research's Hype Cycle diagram |Source=I created the image, though the underlying concept was conceived by Gartner, Inc: http://www.gartner.com/pages/story.php.id.8795.s.8.jsp |Date=Dec 27, 2007 |Location=San Jose, CA |Au
